transform.qs: const params = { ...qs }; const fromRaw = "{{parameters.from}}"; const toRaw = "{{parameters.to}}"; const clean = v => v && v !== 'undefined' && v !== 'null' && v.trim() !== '' ? v.trim() : null; const from = clean(fromRaw); const to = clean(toRaw); if (from) { const ts = new Date(from).getTime(); if (!isNaN(ts)) params.from = Math.floor(ts / 1000); } if (to) { const ts = new Date(to).getTime(); if (!isNaN(ts)) params.to = Math.floor(ts / 1000); } return params;
